div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 174 Naupactus, Locris, 1955 Burial: 250-225 B.C. (Varoucha) Contents: 5+ AV. Pot hoard Aetolian League: 2 st. Seleucus I: 1 st. (Ecbatana) Antiochus I: 1 st. (Ecbatana) Ptolemy II or III: 1 st. (as Svoronos pl. 14, 18-21) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1956, p. 227, illus. Hackens, Antidorum W. Peremans, pp. 76-7
